description.value: You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chainsâ€”but whips and chains also have their place. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Maneuver] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Web] once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells; in both cases, the spells manifest shadowy chains rather than their usual visual signifiers.
